pageTitle: Public events for November 12, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Public events for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, November 12, 2015:

Ottawa

10 a.m. â€“ The Prime Minister holds a Cabinet meeting. A media availability with Ministers will follow in the Foyer of the House of Commons.

Foyer of the House of Commons
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 12:45 p.m.
  • Media should contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery for accreditation.

Ottawa

1:30 p.m.

The Prime Minister holds a media availability at the National Press Theatre.

National Press Theatre
150 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 1:15 p.m.
  • Media should contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery for accreditation.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
